volunteer_experience.info: Worked in a team of 18 members and coordinated recruitment processes and prep drives for 200+ students
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Xavier Institute of Management(XIM Bhubaneswar)
volunteer_experience.title: Treasurer, Student Placement Committee (CAS)

volunteer_experience.info: I worked in a team of 15 members to facilitate students in securing internship and placement opportunities. I was the point of contact for 20+ companies and coordinated placement and internship processes. I organised pre-placement talks and coordinated with HR managers of various companies.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Campus Placement Cell, St. Stephen's College
volunteer_experience.title: Assistant Secretary

volunteer_experience.info: I worked as part of a team on Echo, the Physics Department Journal of St. Stephen's College, Delhi, to revive it after five years of dormancy. I shortlisted and edited articles for the journal with a readership of 100+ members of the Physics Department.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: St. Stephen's College, Delhi
volunteer_experience.title: Copyeditor, Physics Society
